[Introduction to multiple regression](https://cristianmesquida.github.io/multiple_regression/). Three lectures forming part of the course Behavioural Research Methods at Eindhoven University of Technology.

[Introduction to power analysis](https://cristianmesquida.github.io/doing_power_analysis/). One lecture forming part of the course Behavioural Research Methods 2 at Eindhoven University of Technology.
